name: LD37 Survive
description:
This is my first game on Ludum dare 37.

You are captured by some alien creature, trapped in a room. Fortunately, you found a gun. Now it's time to escape the room!

CONTROLS
WSAD: Move
Mouse Move: Aim
Mouse Left Key: Shoot
Collect Gears to upgrade your abilities!

TOOLS
Unity 5.5.0
Aseprite
sfxr

Code on github
